title: John Sally!! (NBA Hall of Fame)
description: John Salley (yes of the NBA) stops by to talk about Audis, Adam Sandler, Chrome cars and Point Break, we also talk about D3 Tuning and spotting Lindsay Lohan's wrecked rental.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: John Salley (yes of the NBA) stops by to talk about Audis, Adam Sandler, Chrome cars and Point Break, we also talk about D3 Tuning and spotting Lindsay Lohan's wrecked rental.
